TI: Gamma oscillations by synaptic inhibition in a homogeneous medium model of hippocampal interneurons.
AB: Population of interacting inhibitory hippocampal neurons is described by a continuous model. The explicit equation for the frequency of synchronized neural firing and the condition for its stability are obtained. The results of their numerical solution are in quantitative agreement with the data of Wang and Buzsaki, 1996 (J. Neurosci. 16, 6402-6413).
AD: Department of Mec. and Math., Rostov State University, Rostov-on-Don, Russia. aolypher@uic.rnd.runnet.ru
